ul_593769: How can I change the resolution of my second monitor?
Top-3 Scripts:
ul_593769: xrandr --newmode <modeline>

xrandr --admode <adapter> <mode>

xrandr --addmode VGA-1 1360x768

xrandr --output VGA-1 --mode 1360x768

Explanations about Options.--mode: This selects a mode. Use either the name or the XID for mode
Explanations about Options.--output: Selects an output to reconfigure. Use either the name of the output or the XID.
